BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service, with bulletins on the hour.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: To get the latest news headlines, business results
and sports scores live on your computer desktop, visit the BBCi
News site and download the News Ticker.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: From London and New York, World Business Report reveals the facts behind the headlines and examines the trends in technology and the world of business.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: Visit the BBCi Business page for the latest business
news headlines and help and advice on personal finance and
work and careers.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with bulletins on the hour.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: Visit the BBCi News site for in depth reports on the
major news stories of the day, from the royals and their butlers
to the conflict with Iraq.

BasicDescription.Title: World News Tonight
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Peter Jennings with the latest news from ABC in America.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: Click on 'More Audio Video News' on the BBCi News
front page to access the AV console on your computer desktop
and watch or listen to the latest news bulletins.
